error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'second_garden_total_plants' (15) was used instead of 'percent_multiplier' (100).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 3
The first garden has 2 tomato plants because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=2>>2
The second garden has 5 tomato plants because 15 x (1/3) = <<15*(1/3)=5>>5
She has 7 tomato plants in total because 2 + 5 = <<2+5=7>>7
She has 35 plants in total because 20 + 15 = <<20+15=35>>35
The proportion of tomato plants is 0.2 because 7 / 35 = <<7/35=0.2>>0.2
The percentage of tomato plants is 3 because 0.2 x 15 = <<0.2*15=3>>3
